title: Notify requester of received request - but IT Solver closed for Christmas

value:
Your request (#{{ticket.id}}) has been received while IT Solver is closed. Upon returning , we will review this request. Thank you for your patience. IT Solver is closed for the following dates:

To add additional comments, reply to this email or click the link below:
{{ticket.url_with_protocol}}

{{ticket.comments_formatted}} Merry Christmas from IT Solver.

raw_title: Notify requester of received request - but IT Solver closed for Christmas
